author: sarowe
msg: Fix maven release artifacts download script to download exactly what's under lucene/maven/ and solr/maven/ at the RC URL - previously the top-level 'org/apache/' directories were not being output.  Also, document the wget options used. (merged trunk r1626594)

author: sarowe
msg: revert commit containing inadvertent change to dev-tools/scripts/smokeTestRelease.py
